import React from "react"; export const Menu = ({ isMenuOpened, handleMenuClick, language, setLanguage, handleLanguageChange }) => { return (
  • {language === 'english' ? 'Home' : 'Home'}
  • {language === 'english' ? 'Rooms' : 'Stanze'}
  • {language === 'english' ? 'Where We Are' : 'Dove Siamo'}
  • {language === 'english' ? 'Prices and Conditions' : 'Tariffe e Condizioni'}
  • {language === 'english' ? 'Information and Offers' : 'Informazioni e Preventivi'}
); }
